meanings.definition: Excessive secretion of pituitary hormones leading to various medical conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that hyperpituitarisms can cause health problems due to too many hormones being released.
meanings.sent2: Her diagnosis of hyperpituitarisms meant she needed to undergo regular medical check-ups.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, Bob joked that his friend's hyperpituitarisms made him grow taller than the door frame.
meanings.sent4: The rapid growth of the city was likened to the unchecked hyperpituitarisms of urban development.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pituitary gland in overdrive helped students understand hyperpituitarisms better.

meanings.definition: The state of having an overactive pituitary gland.
meanings.sent1: Hyperpituitarisms can lead to changes in growth and metabolism.
meanings.sent2: The endocrinologist specializes in treating patients with hyperpituitarisms.
meanings.sent3: The hyperpituitarisms in the laboratory rat made it the fastest runner in the maze.
meanings.sent4: The company's expansion showed signs of hyperpituitarisms as it rapidly grew in size.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hyperpituitarisms was illustrated through a diagram of the pituitary gland.
